nodes.text: Warrl was a leafy plant native only to the Myyydril Caverns, a cave system within the Kkowir Forest on the Wookiee homeworld of Kashyyyk. The Myyydril tribe used it in their cooking, particularly in a drink known as Warrl Surprise. The plant was edible to many different species. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire, a spacer, in an effort to gain the Myyydril tribe's trust, collected ten warrl leaves for a female tribesman named Kirrir, who worked at the small cantina within their village. Kirrir rewarded the spacer with a bottle of Warrl Surprise for the sentient's trouble.

Warrl appeared in the Star Wars Galaxies expansion pack Rage of the Wookiees, released on May 5, 2005, as a collectible quest object. As part of a large, overarching chain of quests, the player was tasked with collecting ten samples of warrl for a Myyydril tribesman. The player was rewarded with a bottle of Warrl Surprise, which was a single use food item that increased the consumer's agility for a short time. The plant and the Warrl Surprise made from it was edible by all playable species in the game.
